sentences.en: A friend is a friend ; a foe is a foe; one must be clearly distinguished from the other.
sentences.cn: 敌是敌,友是 友, 必须分清界限.

sentences.en: At the same time, everything was done to guide our airmen and deceive the foe.
sentences.cn: 与此同时, 又作出一切努力,来引导我们的飞行员和迷惑敌人.

sentences.en: Cancer is a terrible foe and it requires the most powerful treatment that we have available.
sentences.cn: 癌症是可怕的敌人,需要我们目前掌握的最强有力的治疗方法去对付它.

sentences.en: Continence is the foe of heresy.
sentences.cn: 克制是异端邪说的敌人.

sentences.en: He is a deadly foe to us.
He is a very upright man , abhorring evil as a deadly foe.
sentences.cn: 他具有正义感,一向嫉恶如仇.

sentences.en: He knew that Karl could be an implacable foe.
sentences.cn: 他明白卡尔可能会成为他的死敌.

sentences.en: Shakur loses his fragile grip on reality and starts blasting away at friends and foe alike.
sentences.cn: 沙库尔丧失了对形势仅存的一点判断，无论对敌对友都开始大加挞伐。

sentences.en: The knights prevailed against their foe.
sentences.cn: 那些骑士们战胜了他们的敌人.

sentences.en: The stag at bay is a dangerous foe.
This is the most serious challenge from his political foe.
sentences.cn: 这是来自他政敌的最严重的挑战.

sentences.en: Tobacco is a foe to health.
Who goes there friend or foe?
sentences.cn: 谁在那里--是自己人还是敌人?

sentences.en: With power and to spare we must pursue the tottering foe.
You little knew who was your friend and who your foe?
sentences.cn: 你不大分得清谁是你的朋友,谁是你的敌人.

phrases.tran_cn: 朋友还是敌人；是敌还是友

trans.tran_cn: 敌人，仇敌，危害物，反对者
